    • Method Detail

      • getNested

        public SimpleXMLBuilder getNested()
                           throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Description copied from interface: SimpleXMLBuilder
        Get a new SimpleXMLBuilder of the same type as this object. This is to build un-commited content that is appended to this object using the SimpleXMLBuilder.appendParent() method. The calling code need only hold a reference to the current builder as the SimpleXMLBuilder.appendParent() method returns the parent.
        Returns:
        SimpleXMLBuilder
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
